div.p: NutrientModifier : Codes for types of nutrient that is being modified such as carbohydrate or sodium. This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT where concept is-a 226355009 (Nutrients(substance)), and the concepts for Sodium, Potassium and Fluid. It is provided as a suggestive example.
